## 2025-11-19

### Changes

- Expands `pay-now` deeplink step with `accountId`
- Makes `TransactInteraction` (and similar) structs publicly initializable. This makes them mockable for unit tests. 
- Improves handling and animations of `hideTransact`

### Products

- Deposit
- Switch
- Manage

### Requirements

| Name  | Version |
| ----- | ------- |
| Xcode | >= 16   |
| iOS   | >= 13   |

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/atomicfi/ios-sdk/compare/[3.24.0]...[3.25.0]
